description: Designed visual content for customers and their events
Used Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop to create proofs and final designs
Redesigned cards, advertisements, menus from low-quality resources given by customers
Helped customers understand what exactly they are looking for and need to print
Organized forms and filed records to ensure consistency and accurate tracking, reducing the time to find documents quickly
Utilized Excel spreadsheet reports to organize and categorize data, increasing streamline accuracy of calculations
Matched bank transactions and events to Quicken by following accounting principles, pinpointing errors, and deducing possibilities of money loss
Gave feedback on the breakdown of points relating to the specific student, increasing their incentive to show work on their next quizzes
Achieved an increase in student grades with an average of 8% for 4 classes
Worked with professors and attended one-on-one lessons with students, improving their understanding of the quiz material
Conducted daily research for 8 hours a week and bi-weekly presentations to manage progress of experimentation
Worked closely with mentors to strengthen understanding of topic and use proper research resources available, expanding the architecture of electrical circuit wiring for project
Connected sensors and data communication with code for 16 inputs from joints of a single hand, modeling from 9,600 samples to find a linear fit for gesture detection
Developed a prototype utilizing multiple software programs and implemented a representative 3D interface, increasing the recognition of gesture input
Used TexWorks and TexStudio to format PDF documents, evaluating conceptual detail and consistency of various reports reflective to class lectures
Created weekly reports and attended Zoom meetings with professor to manage suggestions and discuss student score performance
